stale_policy.description: How to handle a missing/stale index for read operations that depend on it.

max_reindex_ms.description: Time budget for automatic (re)index (best-effort). 0 disables auto-index even when stale_policy=auto.

allow_filesystem_fallback.description: Allow bounded filesystem scanning fallback for text search and diagnostics when an index is missing or stale.

include_paths.description: Optional path allowlist. Paths are repo-relative. Interpreted as prefixes unless a glob is detected.

exclude_paths.description: Optional path denylist. Paths are repo-relative. Interpreted as prefixes unless a glob is detected.

file_pattern.description: Optional glob pattern applied after include/exclude filters (e.g. "**/*.rs").
